title: Integrate
content:
Service Management supports integrations with the following products. For support matrix information about these integrations, visit the Integration Central website.

  • You can also use Connect-It to integrate with other products. For more information about the Connect-It configuration, see Integrate with Connect-It.
  • It's recommended to create a distinct user for each integration.
  • For all integrations that use OPB, you need to create only one integration user for the OPB agent to access Service Management.
  • An integration user that's defined in Service Management consumes a license unless it has the "Integration user" role defined in Suite Administration.
  • For integration with authentication services such as LDAP, SAML, and OAUTH, see Configure authentication in IdM Admin Portal.

OpenText integrations

You can integrate the suite with the following OpenText products.

ProductDescriptionMethodDocumentation

ALM Octane

Enables you to set up a bi-directional integration with Octane to submit Defects or Enhancement requests from Service Portal or other Service Management record types. The integration also allows to keep the data in sync in both systems.

Integration StudioIntegrate with ALM Octane
ALM/Quality Center

Enables you to set up a bi-directional integration with Quality Center to submit Defects or Enhancement requests from Service Portal or other Service Management record types. The integration also allows to keep the data in sync in both systems.

Integration StudioIntegrate with Quality Center
ArcSight SOAREnables you to update cases in ArcSight SOAR.Integration StudioIntegrate with ArcSight SOAR
Asset ManagerEnables you to import demo data from Asset Manager.Integration StudioIntegrate with Asset Manager
Connect-ItEnables you to use Connect-It to integrate Service Management with other products.N/AIntegrate with Connect-It
Core ContentEnables you to embed a Core Content widget in Service Management so that users can manage documents in Core Content. Integration StudioIntegrate with Core Content
Core ContentEnables you to index knowledge from Core Content.IDOL connector and OPBIndex knowledge from OpenText Core Content
Endpoint ManagementEnables you to import devices from ZENworks into the UCMDB and the SACM module.Integration StudioEndpoint Management connector
Extended ECMEnables you to index knowledge from Extended ECM repositories.IDOL connector and OPBIndex knowledge from OpenText Extended ECM
HCMEnables you to do the following:
  • VM provisioning in HCM via Service Management Service Portal
  • VM provisioning failure handling in Service Management-HCM
OPBIntegrate with HCM
Operations Bridge Manager (OBM)Enables you to create and update incidents in Service Management based on events in Operations Bridge Manager (OBM).

OPB and External Systems

To set up the integration, see Integrate with Operations Bridge Manager (OBM).

For information on external configurations, which you can use to simplify the integration, see External configurations.

Operations Orchestration (OO)Enables you to import content from Operations Orchestration so you can run the imported flows as an automatic task in a record.

OPB

To perform the integration, see How to perform an integration with Operations Orchestration.

To set up encryption for the integration, see How to set up encryption for an Operations Orchestration integration.

For a use case example, see Operations Orchestration integration use case.

Operations Orchestration RAS (OO RAS)OO RAS interacts with OO Central and polls it for operations to run.Operations OrchestrationIntegrate with Operations Orchestration RAS
PPM Outbound Integration

Enables you to send Service Management ideas and proposals to Project and Portfolio Management (PPM).

The Service Management-PPM integration through the PPM Outbound Integration endpoint is deprecated and will be obsoleted in a future release. Use the Integration Studio-based PPM integration instead.

OPB

Integration with Project and Portfolio Management (PPM)
Service ManagerEnables you to exchange incidents and requests between Service Management and Service Manager. 

External Systems

For an overview of the SM integration, see External systems - Service Manager integration.

To perform the integration, add Service Manager as an external system. For more information, see Working with external systems.

For detailed integration scenarios for incidents, see Case Exchange integration for incidents.
For detailed integration scenarios for requests, see Case Exchange integration for requests.

Service ManagerEnables you to move data from Service Manager to Service Management.Integration StudioIntegrate with Service Manager
Service ManagementEnables you to move knowledge articles and do case exchange between two Service Management tenants.Integration StudioIntegrate with Service Management
Strategic Portfolio Management (ValueEdge Strategy)/PPMEnables you to create Epics in SPM or Proposals in PPM for Service Management Ideas. It also enables you to create projects in PPM for Service Management Proposals. Integration StudioIntegration with SPM/PPM
UCMDBEnables you to synchronize configuration item (CI) data from UCMDB with Service Management.

OPB

Native SACM

Integrate with UCMDB

Native SACM

ZENworksEnables you to import devices from ZENworks into the UCMDB and the SACM module.Integration StudioIntegrate with ZENworks

Third-party integrations

You can integrate the suite with the following third-party products.

Product Description Method Documentation
Asana Enables you to import user entitlements from Asana. Integration Studio Integrate with Asana for SAM
Atlassian Confluence Enables you to index knowledge from Confluence. IDOL connector and OPB Index knowledge from Confluence

Atlassian Jira

Enables you to set up a bi-directional integration with Jira to submit Defects or Enhancement requests from Service Portal or other Service Management record types. The integration also allows you to keep the data in sync in both systems.

Integration Studio

 Integrate with Atlassian Jira
AWS Management & Governance Enables you to import AWS billing data and cloud accounts, which are required by the CMP FinOps solution. Integration Studio & 

Cloud Cost Data Provider

 Integrate with AWS for CMP FinOps
Business Intelligence (BI) Enables you to define the fields and relationships that are synced for a record type when integrating with an external business intelligence system.

REST API

 To perform the integration, see Business Intelligence integration.

For detailed information on the BI integration REST API, see Business Intelligence integration API.
Computer Telephony Integration (CTI) Enables Service Management to automatically display information about the caller and details about the caller's service and support requests on the Live Support page when agents receive a telephone call.  CTI Configure Live Support with CTI
Datadog Enables you to forward Datadog incidents to Service Management and schedule downtime in Datadog. Integration Studio Integrate with Datadog
External email service Enables you to request appropriate knowledge articles, create requests, add comments, and accept solutions to existing requests without logging in, using specially prepared email messages to do so.  OPB Configure email integration
GitHub actions Enables you to integrate with GitHub actions, to run workflows and get their status. Integration Studio Github Actions connector
Google Cloud Resource Manager Enables you to import Google Cloud billing data and cloud accounts, which are required by the CMP FinOps solution. Integration Studio & 

Cloud Cost Data Provider

 Integrate with GCP for CMP FinOps
Jenkins Enables you to integrate with Jenkins, to get builds and trigger Jenkins Jobs. Integration Studio Jenkins connector
LDAP Enables you to synchronize user and group records from LDAP with Service Management.

OPB

 To perform the synchronization integration, see Integrate with LDAP.
Lucid Enables you to import Lucidchart and Lucidspark user entitlements. Integration Studio Integrate with Lucid for SAM
Meta WhatsApp Enables you to proactively inform users about important issues in your environment. Integration Studio Integrate with WhatsApp
Microsoft 365
  • Enables you to create requests based on emails that users send to a designated Microsoft 365 mailbox.
  • Enables you to import user entitlement data and license consumption data from Microsoft 365.
 Integration Studio
  • Microsoft 365 email integration
  • Integrate with Microsoft 365 for SAM
Microsoft Azure Active Directory (AD) Enables you to import users and groups (as well as user-group relationships) from Azure AD into Service Management. Integration Studio Integrate with Azure AD
Microsoft Azure Billing Enables you to import Azure billing data and cloud accounts, which are required by the CMP FinOps solution. Integration Studio & 

Cloud Cost Data Provider

 Integrate with Azure for CMP FinOps 
Microsoft Azure DevOps

Enables you to set up a bi-directional integration with Azure DevOps to submit Defects or Enhancement requests from Service Portal or other Service Management record types. The integration also allows you to keep the data in sync in both systems.

Integration Studio

Integrate with Azure DevOps
Microsoft Intune Enables you to import devices/endpoints from Intune into the SACM module. Integration Studio Integrate with Microsoft Intune
Microsoft SharePoint Enables you to index knowledge from SharePoint sites. IDOL connector and OPB Index knowledge from SharePoint
Microsoft Teams  Enables you to use Microsoft Teams to support bot-based interactions, and to send notification messages to Teams channels or private / group chats. Integration Studio Integrate with Microsoft Teams
OpenAI ChatGPT Enables you to send questions to ChatGPT and get the response in the Discussions tab within the ticket.

Integration Studio

Integrate with OpenAI ChatGPT
Salesforce Sales Cloud Enables you to import user entitlement data and license consumption data from Salesforce. Integration Studio Integrate with Salesforce Sales Cloud for SAM
Salesforce Slack Enables you to send messages to the configured Slack channel to inform users about important issues in your environment. Integration Studio Integrate with Salesforce Slack
SAP Solution Manager Enables case exchange between Service Management and an external Service Provider that uses SAP Solution Manager as a ticketing tool. OPB and Operations Orchestration (OO) Integrate with SAP Solution Manager

SAP SuccessFactors

Enables you to achieve HR-related use cases, such as checking holiday balance, new employee onboarding, and so on.

Integration Studio

Integrate with SAP SuccessFactors
Smartsheet Enables you to import user entitlement data from Smartsheet. Integration Studio Integrate with Smartsheet for SAM
Webex Enables you to import user entitlement data and license consumption data from Webex. Integration Studio Integrate with Webex for SAM
